column4: Anyone know of a good calendar app for Linux? There's a Mozilla-developed plugin for Thunderbird, but I'd prefer a stand-alone application, and then there apparently was a standalone version, but it has been disbanded (?)...
the plugin for thunderbird is available as a stand a lone.. sunbird
Yeah, but apparently it's been disbanded or something? http://www.mozilla.org/projects/calendar/ recommends not using it for some reason.
didn't know that.. I always use it in conjunction with thunderbird
